#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int a[100],i,j;
	a[1]=0;
	a[2]=1;
	for(i=3;i<=25;i++)
	
	{
		if(i%2==1)
		a[i]=a[i-1]*i-1;
		else
		a[i]=a[i-1]*i+1;
		
	}
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",a[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
